# Reproval (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[Hades (Domain)|Hades]] 2, [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 170

*You rap the switch in your hand and then sharply against your thigh, finishing the final gesture that will bring discomfort to your foe.*

When the spell is cast, the subject is [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round and [[Shaken|shaken]] for the duration of the spell. Furthermore, a spellcaster targeted by *reproval* must make a successful Concentration check (DC equal to the save DC for this spell + the level of the spell being cast) to cast spells while under its effect.

*Focus:* A stick at least 1 foot long.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *rebuke* to *reproval* to avoid duplication.

*House Rule:* Added Shaman 2 to Level per Oriental Adventures.
